post:
Hi everyone,

[QuickPacket](https://www.quickpacket.com) is pleased to offer our Core i3 530 server out of 530 W 6th St in Los Angeles, CA. Please contact our sales department with any questions prior to ordering.

**Intel Core i3 530 - SuperMicro**

* Dual Core 2.93 GHz / 4 MB Cache / HyperThreading (4 Threads)
* 8 GB RAM
* 1TB Hard Drive or 128GB SSD
* 5 IPv4 Addresses on Private VLAN with Reverse DNS
* /64 IPv6 Addresses upon request, larger blocks with justification
* Dedicated KVM over IP / IPMI
* 20 TB Bandwidth / 1 Gbps Port
* Unmanaged
* Located in 530 W 6th St / Los Angeles, CA

**$29.99 per month - Click to Order Now: [Los Angeles](https://www.quickpacket.com/billing/cart.php?a=add&pid=88&promocode=UTT2S2QDDJ) (Coupon Code UTT2S2QDDJ)**

* QuickPacket was founded in 2003 and is a registered LLC in North Carolina.
* Network providers include Cogent, Hibernia, GTT, Zayo, and peering ([AS46261](http://bgp.he.net/AS46261)). Connectivity to PCCW is pending.
* Ping/traceroute to 199.233.236.90. Please contact us for a test file link.
* Warez-related, Bulk Mail, and Spam-related activities are strictly forbidden. Please review our [Terms of Service](https://www.quickpacket.com/tos.html) prior to ordering.
* We accept PayPal, VISA, MasterCard, American Express, Discover, and Bitcoin (through BitPay) payments.
* Coupon code is mentioned above. The discounted price will be reflected on the second page of the order form.
* Promotional pricing is available for new customers or existing customers adding additional servers. Promotional offers cannot be combined with other promotional offers.

Thanks for your interest!
